website_summaries.verdict: A motion sensor you can control with an app that floats on the water and sounds an alarm when something enters your pool.
pros: Comes with an app control system that allows you to change its sensitivity
This float turns back on after 10 minutes of no movement
Has a second alarm to sound inside your home
Comes with a tether to tie to the side of your pool
Alarm also shows on your phone
App operates as a remote control to shut off the alarm if needed
cons: If you have continuous flowing water in your pool, it may inadvertently set off this alarm

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Lifebuoy and Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Guess they read my previous review about how my pool unit died after less than a month. I got a new pool unit in the mail and $100 credit for the inconvenience. Thank you Lifebouy and Amazon. I'm hoping this one doesn't have a problem:)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Buell

customer_reviews.title: Lifeuoy Pool alarm wireless
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was advertised as being controllable via smart phone. This is a Bluetooth item not a wifi item and will not read my phone 30' away in the front bedroom. To bad it will not work with my wifi security cameras. The other item is that the pool unit is a closed unit and there is no way to change the battery. I had read that it was interchangeable but it states to return the unit to have the battery replaced. Not even the option of charging it up. This limits the life of a expensive unit, or makes it unavailable when sent in to replace a battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is sensitive enough to go off in rain/wind storm
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive but no price tag on my kid's safety. We installed last week and it already started going off with a bad rain storm. My husband was annoyed. I said great, I am glad it is so sensitive. We did turn it off during the storm which is easy enough to do. I hope I never have to see if it works with a child.
customer_reviews.author: KmmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: 3 months of use and constant alarms
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review as the alarm now goes off multiple times a day when there has been no movement in the pool at all. I tried updating the sensitivity but that didn’t help. Unfortunately it seems like it was a waste of $300. ————— The instruction manual is unnecessarily long just watch the video in the app! This alarm works well so far but I have no idea if it’s worth the price as I’ve never used a less expensive pool alarm
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E Lofvers

customer_reviews.title: Works great And saves lives!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service and great product! Our toddler nearly drowned in our pool so we got this to prevent any further issues. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Blindtina7

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The deciding factor to purchase the Lifebuoy pool security alarm was it didn't require you to drill into your pool. Once I received it I knew I made the right decision. The Lifebuoy is amazing, only surpassed by Lifebuoy's Customer Service. They are immediately available to guide you with the setup and answer any questions you may have. The alarm is very loud and the app keeps you informed of any activity. You can even take the Lifebuoy with you on vacation. My recommendation is ...... JUST GET IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: working perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. First alarm stopped working after a few days. Even though I missed the deadline for return, vendor sent a new one.. New alarm working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Pool alarm seems to be just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Have just started using but so far has been very easy to use and worked just like it should. Did a test with 20lb of water bottles as suggested and alarm was perfect. Contrary to what some reviews have said I thought it was very well constructed, good packaging, and does say battery in unit can be changed by the user.
customer_reviews.author: Mynda

customer_reviews.title: does the job but could be better for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but it could use improvement. I was excited about the app capability but it only works if i can close by the device. if their is a false alarm i cannot turn it off from somewhere else which is very annoying. It took awhile to move find the correct location in the pool and sensitivity setting, but seems to be doing its job now. less false alarms and goes off when someone jumps in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Come Close to Working Correctly
customer_reviews.text: In order for the product to even make a connection, the control unit and floating unit need to be within a few feet of each other. And, if you try to use the app on your phone, the phone needs to remain within a few feet of the control unit. I could only get the product to work correctly just one time after the initial connection was made between control and floating unit. After that it would randomly work and NOT work. I really like the idea of this product, but it is VERY undependable. Unfortunately, I missed the window of opportunity to return it.
customer_reviews.author: KaDo

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October to be ready for inspection when my pool was completed. When I received the unit I put it aside for when I needed it. Today was my inspection so I took the unit out of the box and proceeded to set it up. No battery was there for the pool unit so I opened it up and found that there was an old battery inside which was completely corroded along with the 9 volt prongs. No way to replace the corroded battery as the unit itself was corroded on the inside. Failed the inspection of course. I emailed the company through the app. I’ll let y’all know what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Just Maryellen

customer_reviews.title: Works almost too good!
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is great but very sensitive, It will go off if your pool pump is set to high and it will go off during a storm. But if your goal is to potentially save the life of a child then you can't beat this alarm buoy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the alarm went off with the slightest breeze, other times you had to JUMP into the pool for it to go off. The home unit is so cheaply made, and has a ridiculously way of disgusting which setting it is on (by the number of beeps?). The only way to be sure it's on the correct setting is to use to app; which only SOMETIMES connects, and only when you're about 10 feet or less away. I am shocked that this product is even allowed to be on the market! I would in no way feel safe using this as a safety device for my family! To top it off, the price is RIDICULOUS for such poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: MRG818

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our pool two weeks ago and pool unit stopped working after one week. It won’t connect to house unit. Also, when it did initially work the alarm in pool was not very loud. As well, it would often disconnect from the house unit, making it unreliable. App is useless unless within a few feet of the pool which defeats the purpose of having an app. Very disappointed. Amazon offered to send a replacement which we accepted. Second unit arrived and DOES NOT WORK. Now I have to return both.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ciavarella

customer_reviews.title: Great for piece of mind!
customer_reviews.text: The unit works as advertised. The alarm is LOUD and very sensitive however we would rather it be more sensitive than less if something were to happen. The app is a nice convenience and worked well for us, however the pool was not far and we haven’t tested it in a space further than about 150ft. I really love how everything is so compact as we plan to take it with us for summer vacation and there was no need to actually physically install it in the pool. Overall we found the unit to work as advertised and we think it is worth it to know our little is safer.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised nothing less or more.
customer_reviews.text: Had a issue with LifebuoyAlarm pool module, so I sent a email to the company. They immediately sent me a replacement module with no questions asked. I like a company that stands behind its products and keeps customer satisfaction at the forefront.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Man

customer_reviews.title: Works with very little water contact
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my sister. She said it seems to work great based off of testing it, but they haven't had any actual close calls yet, thank goodness. She is happy and has peace of mind, so overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Great product with unparalleled customer service in today’s market
customer_reviews.text: It’s expensive but once you learn what is the best setting and what works best for you it is great and customer service couldn’t be better.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great additional layer of protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for as an additional layer of protection for our 5 Grandkids, ages 2-8 Although the older kids are pretty good swimmers they have a habit of leaving the safety gate open as well as house door. Our 2 yr old thinks she's a mermaid and is fearless! At the first opportunity she'll get in. Having this when they're here helps me sleep at night
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great pool alarm for small children with great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pool alarm in March of 2019. However, my pool was still closed so I did not open the box until May. Installation could not have been any easier! I did have a small “hiccup” a couple weeks into use when the pool device took in some pool water and shorted out. However, I could not have received any greater customer support! I received a replacement pool unit within days after emailing my issues with pics and receipt to Lifebuoy. New unit is working like a charm! I would highly recommend this pool alarm knowing that LifebuoyAlarm will stand behind their product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the 3rd one’s a charm!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one in two months!!! First one got water inside and the wires to the battery eroded off. The next one constantly goes off when there is no motion in the water!! I’m going to try for a third one new side I like the idea of this product and with my little one still not swimming yet, it’s a good piece of mind... cross your fingers!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great for an extra level of security around the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Manlove

customer_reviews.title: The app on my phone will not work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of its claim to be controlled through the mobile phone app. I have an iPhone x, and I've installed the app at least 4 times, restarted my phone, done all of the suggestions. When I click on it, it simply disappears! I've tried to find a website for troubleshooting, I have left feedback for the seller and Amazon, and no response. So I'm left with either using the floating unit or the remote that is mounted in the house to control the alarm. This makes it far less flexible for a grandma wanting to keep the kids safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: works great I have grandchildren and dogs so it gives me added security
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any size pool
customer_reviews.text: We recently put a small pool up in our yard and my 3 year old son likes to just go get in on his own. This was a must for us as I let him play in our fenced in yard alone quite a bit of the time. No price is worth his life so I’m glad we purchased this product. Is does go off randomly in storms but it doesn’t bother me. Great purchase in my eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This company has gone beyond the reasonable expectations of customer service! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as claimed:(
customer_reviews.text: This product just doesn’t work! The only time it went off in our pool (in ground 16x38) was when our water feature on the tanning ledge turns on at 8am. Or in the middle of the night when no one was in the pool. Kids would jump in and nothing. I did the test showed on the video dropping in case of water, first it didn’t go off the second time it did. Also extremely hard to understand the instructions from the booklet. I had to watch the tutorial on line. Wish it worked. I would love to have the peace of mind however it just doesn’t work as it claims. Sadly I’m out the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Momto3boys

customer_reviews.title: A lot better then I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It amazes me that there are very few pool alarm options on the market. That said I was hesitant to order the lifebuoy with only a 3.5 star rating but having 7 dogs around my pool gets me really nervous and I did not want to walk out to my backyard and see the unthinkable! The app is only good for setting up the sensitivity and that’s about it, other then that the alarm has worked flawlessly, This alarm has helped me get better nights sleep knowing that if one of my dogs falls in I will hear the alarm. I am giving it 5 stars because it has worked far better then I expected and I rarely leave reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Corral

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: This unit is absolute garbage. It is scary to know that this safety device is being sold which clearly does not function properly. I have gone through four of these units and they regularly take on water and simply die for no reason. The manufacturer is impossible to get a hold of and simply do not respond to inquiries. The app is equally worthless. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: You will hear this alarm
customer_reviews.text: We always worry about one of the kids getting into the pool when they aren’t suppose to so we wanted to try this out. Since it’s winter, we put it under our pool cover and then tested it a few times by removing the pool cover. It’s screaming loud so you will be fully aware if anyone tries to get into the pool. I recommend it. Can’t wait to try it out in the summer
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: The kids next door frequently launch a ball or frisbee over the fence into our yard. They're polite. I believe that they always ask for permission to retrieve their toys. Still, I'm relieved to have this alarm as a backup. The app is easy to download and configure. Finding a weather-proof location to mount the base station was a bit more of a challenge. I appreciate that it has a standby setting for when people are actually in the pool. And I also like that it knows when it's not in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly S

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service WINS
customer_reviews.text: We used LifeBuoy last swimming season. We did have a few "false alarms" due to a frog or a swimming toy and a horrible rainstorm, but that's all fine with us for the sake of our kids. At the start of this season the battery started to die or perhaps it was a malfunction in the pool part. We contacted them and they sent us a new part right away! They ask for proof of receipt, so me being horrible at keeping receipts was glad that amazon keeps all those records!
customer_reviews.author: lpatton

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: This is my initial review. The cone is cracked. You can’t see the LED light. And when I walk about 100 feet from the pool the app stops working. I wanted to contact the seller, it you can’t call you must email. This product appears so poor that it gives me no piece of mind at all. Planning to return I emailed the company they are correcting my issues and were extremely helpful. I am keeping the product and will update again as summer goes on!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mellace

customer_reviews.title: Great for a pool with young kids!
customer_reviews.text: This pool alarm is great! We just bought a house that has a pool. As a mom of two young kids, I was worried about the safety of having a pool, so we bought this alarm. The alarm itself is fine. We haven't had any false alarms or issues with it so far. It's loud enough to alert us if something were to happen. The biggest perk is the app. It's super easy to use and very convenient. It's totally worth the cost to make sure my kids are safe!!!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Birds land on & it set it off
customer_reviews.text: There's no way to attach that clear plastic cone, so it fell to the bottom of the pool immediately. It keeps getting set off by birds landing on it (maybe this will happen with any floating alarm tho)
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for pool safety!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use - love this! We had been looking for something like this for the past few years, and this exactly fits the bill. Feel so much safer now with little kids around the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous and unacceptable failure when needed most
customer_reviews.text: The initial pool alarm obviously wasn’t sealed properly, because condensation was visible in the window and it stopped working. That unit was replaced, now the replacement has stopped working. The youngest grandchild is now swimming but we have three dogs. Today the smallest at 19 lbs fell in the pool BUT NO ALARM SOUNDED. It would have drowned but luckily I looked outside and noticed her struggling, ran and pulled her out, exhausted and unable to get out of the water. This item is fantastic WHEN IT WORKS. This is an expensive purchase especially since the second unit has now failed. What if you were unaware that a CHILD that could not swim fell in instead of a dog..........
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful alarm
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is great! We have a few small children and fear that one will find a way to get into the pool area. It also helped us discover that our neighbors were taking late night swims in our pool. I tell you there is no way that you will not hear this alarm, it is very loud and sounds from both inside the house and at the pool. Easy to set up. Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Michler

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: It works great. The alarm is quite loud and if the water is disturbed it definitely gets your attention. Although we still take many precautions because of our grandchildren it definitely adds to our peace of mind knowing it’s always ready to sound off in case something happens. I would also like to say that the customer service is outstanding and the times I’ve contacted them they were quick to address my needs. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Mallard

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The initial install was so easy and worked like a charm. However, after a few weeks we began to have false alarms with no wind or anything else in the pool. I contacted customer service who request some photos of the set up of the system. Satisfied that we installed it correctly, they said the pool unit might have been defective and may have gotten water inside and promptly sent a replacement at no charge. They were quick to respond and make it right! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jon B.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! Don’t buy before you read this review!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to purchase this alarm after I saw the amazing features it had. I decided it’s high price is worth the safety. About 2 weeks after I installed the pool device it is dead! $300 for 2 weeks. Terribly disappointed. Don’t be fooled and buy.
customer_reviews.author: American

customer_reviews.title: Good alarm but app did not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Pros:Easy to install. Good instruction booklet. Alarm works well. Seems oversensitive at times but I would rather that than undersensitive. Cons: the phone app does not seem to function unless you are within range of the alarm. Range is short- less than a few hundred feet.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Juliano

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product I've Ever Ordered on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Unit never worked properly. I've spent literally 3+ hours trying to set this product up over several weeks. It goes off indiscriminately at all times of the day and night. All settings have been adjusted including sensitivity. We changed the location of the unit within the pool but that did not help either. It also goes off if there is no wind or pumps running. Also the pool unit will not connect to the home unit. It's very frustrating that there is no customer service or technical support to call either. It's unfathomable that this company can do this and stay in business.
customer_reviews.author: G Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Life Buoy alarm system for our pool in May 2019. When we reopened our pool recently, we noticed the pool unit was no longer working (water had gotten in it). Tech support was very nice and sent us a new unit quickly (& free of charge)!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Story

customer_reviews.title: Could not get it to work properly.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work ok, for about 2 weeks, then alarm sounded when it rained. Turned down the sensitivity, then the alarm sounded when the sun hit it in the morning, and at various times during the night and early morning. No wind or rain. The company sent a replacement, which kept shutting off the home unit. The company refunded my money through pay-pal.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Went off at all hours of the night and day
customer_reviews.text: We could not get this sensitivity to work correctly. It also had a hard time connecting to the app. We are new to having a pool, but this just didn't work for us. It went off whenever the jets would turn on, the vacuum would start, or when it rained. It is hurricane season, so it rained a ton. It even went off when it was lying on a table out of the water and no one was around it. It did alert me when my daughter stuck her feet in the pool, so it does work correctly, but at other times too. It is very loud, so if that is what you are looking for, get this.
customer_reviews.author: jackie s.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It goes off all the time so we just had to turn it off so kind of pointless. I would get an underwater alarm instead. The phone app doesn’t work very good either. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False alarms frequently
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have returned this sooner to get my money back. What a waste. It constantly goes off and there’s no movement in the pool. My husband gets annoyed with it. For $300...obviously you can’t put a price tag on safety but it’s been turned upside down on the side of the pool because it constantly goes off. And you can’t change the battery? Ya I’m not too smart should have done better research.
customer_reviews.author: katrina kmiecik

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working 30 days after we received it. They won’t let you return it.
customer_reviews.author: William pierce

customer_reviews.title: Can finally relax!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I finally found the right alarm for our pool! I was worried the sensitivity would be to high, but it's perfect! We have trees above our pool area and I was happy that I was able to adjust the sensitivity so that every little thing that fell off a tree didnt set the alarm off. This has given me peace of mind when it comes to the kids playing outside.
customer_reviews.author: deanne kimme

customer_reviews.title: Alarm doesn't work-Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: I installed the alarm as directed, tested it and it work the first time. Went to turn it back on and had at least 6 people try to get it to work with no luck. Reached out the LifeBuoy and they sent me a video to watch. I watched it to make sure installed it properly. Installed it properly..doesn't work. requested a call twice with no call. I just hope nothing happens to my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Murnin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and use. It definitely does it's job and the alarm is LOUD! Just what we were looking for with 3 little ones. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the quality and failure to work.
customer_reviews.text: The pool alarm seemed easy to install; however, the siren would only go off indoors not pool side. Also, we had to finally turn the alarm on standby due to the alarm going off constantly! We even turned the sensitivity down, moved to different locations in the pool but nothing helped. The alarm would never sound poolside. Only had it one day and I would like to send it back if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as said it would . Hard to set up didn't work right now help from customer service.. I paid alot of money to get what I thought was the best n was the worst would never recommend this
customer_reviews.author: robin jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Ok product but difficult app
customer_reviews.text: The product was ok setting up and the alarm is loud enough but getting the app to sync with the device is so difficult. No matter how close or far apart I put the device and try the app on my phone it just keep telling me that the alarm is not on or too far away. The product work without the app, I just can't just the settings through the app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t waterproof and it goes in a pool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and had to wait to use them cause the pool was yet to be finished but needed them for the inspection. Once the pool was done I placed them in one works fine does the job the other wasn’t waterproof and water got inside and it has stopped working but I can’t return it cause it’s outside the window!!
customer_reviews.author: challenging

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It served its purpose until we had our pool fence installed. Price is a little steap for what you’re getting. First unit got water in it, but manufacturer responded quickly with a refund and a new unit. AA++ for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Expensive. The slightest wind set it off and causes a panic. It’s loud and would be good for safety if I didn’t have to pull the battery out.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Can someone help me!
customer_reviews.text: Looking to exchange or get a refund. This alarm goes off ALL THE TIME. We took it out of the pool and shut it down and it still randomly goes off. I have it sitting in my car right now so it stops waking us up. Worst purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A Must for pool safety
customer_reviews.text: Special needs child that’s very inquisitive. Works just as stated a must.
customer_reviews.author: DiamondDiva

customer_reviews.title: I recommend spending the money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine. I just did not trust it. Save your money, buy a fence for around the pool or a spider net. I might use the device for a dog but not my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I like how sensitive this alarm is. It’s really easy to put together and set up. Being a mom of a young child and having fur babies, the alarm comes in handy. During heavy rain it will set it off but it’s easy to turn off if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sven Gerstner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have small children and a small pool. We are diligent about watching them outside; but this is a necessary addition when you have little ones. Water got in to the sensor and we contacted customer support. We got an immediate response, after emailing a photo, they figured out what needed to be replaced and shipped it free of charge to us immediately. Great product, great customer service. If you have little ones, you need this product.
customer_reviews.author: Loriellen Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Poor signal between home and pool unit
customer_reviews.text: Poor signal. App functionality is not the best .. Sometimes turned off without warning . I have to be checking home device constantly to make sure Is on..
customer_reviews.author: carlos a quintero

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Life-buoy customer support has been very responsive to my concerns. Keep an eye on the main circumferential water sealing o-ring as this will cause the unit to fail which happened to me over time. Life-buoy has responded by sending me a replacement unit with 0 hassle and 0 cost which speaks volumes on their behalf. Great product, however needs a little re-design to ensure water does not intrude. They will figure it out though...I'm sure of it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sugarek

customer_reviews.title: A must with a pool!
customer_reviews.text: While no child as fallen in to see if this works, you just feel at ease knowing if it was to happen, that you would be notified. This is a great thing to have in your pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: The alarm may be a little on the sensitive side, it I would rather be safer than sorry! I think every home with a pool AND kids needs this!
customer_reviews.author: kay11mae

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this device, 2nd unit is bad with original false alarms. We want our money back!
customer_reviews.text: Unit is defective, alarms with no reason. Many times the device wakes us in the wee hours of the morning. We have emailed the supplier and are waiting for a reply. I will update this review once a response has been received. Ok we did receive a replacement unit. The replacement was shipped promptly and appears to be working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: Great for safety!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for safety. Sometimes it beeps randomly because of rain or wind but I’d rather have it beep more and be safe than sorry. It takes some time to understand the app but overall, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lee

customer_reviews.title: Breaks quickly due to water accumulation, Lifebuoy eventually refunded
customer_reviews.text: We've had two of these, both of which have been defective. Lifebuoy replaced the first after water crept into the pool unit and shorted everything out. Despite all of the reviews to the contrary, we hoped this just meant that we had a defective unit. Nope. Replacement unit within one month experienced the same problem. Lifebuoy refunded us after a lengthy process.
customer_reviews.author: William Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Basic pool alarm. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pool alarm is pretty basic but does the job. It floats in the pool and detects large movements. Instructions are pretty straightforward which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: Happy Family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the safety of my daughter around the pool. I must say I am very impressed by not only the quality, but the install process. Thank you so much for keeping my family safe!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer support

customer_reviews.title: Great product  and customer service

product_meta.title: Lifebuoy Pool Alarm System - Pool Motion Sensor - Smart Pool Alarm That is Application Controlled. Powerful Sirens Blare at Poolside and Indoors
feature_bullets: A REVOLUTIONARY WARNING SYSTEM FOR A SAFER POOL - Lifebuoy is equipped with home and pool units designed to sound an alarm when a person or pet falls into water. Multiple sensors and a state of the art microprocessor are used to detect the pool area. It is a versatile, reliable alarm that can detect movement in the pool with long range RF.
SWIM MODE - The lifebuoy pool alarm is smart - After 10 minutes of absence of movement, the system will reactivate and in the event of a fall into the pool an alarm will go on.

BLUETOOTH BASED - Use the lifebuoy App to control and configure your lifebuoy Alarm. You can control the alarm state, change the length of the alert in case of alarm, or adjust the sensitivity of the lifebuoy pool alarm when your App is connected to Bluetooth and you are in range. Note: Lifebuoy does not work away from home.
COVER ALERT - Lifebuoy is designed to alert when pool cover is removed. We are very proud with this technology, as it is the only pool alarm that can effectively be used when the pool is covered.

LIFEBUOY EVERYWHERE - Use with almost every type of pool, spa and garden pond. Suitable for constructed or temporary pools, Jacuzzis and ornamental pools. Lifebuoy was designed with portability in mind. Light and compact, you can take it with you on vacations and trips. CE, FCC approved and complies with ASTM.
